title: T207's for sale - including tough backs, fronts ... even sides!
author: frohme

posts.post_title: T207's for sale - including tough backs, fronts ... even sides!
posts.post_content:
A bit of everything T207 - HOFers, tough cards and backs, easy cards and backs, and well ... you get the drift. Images at [url]https://imageevent.com/gspinf/forsaletrade/tradematerial[/url] - variety of fronts and backs - some tough for the grade, others tough no matter how you slice it.

As ever - an "I'll take it" takes precedence over an extended negotiation.  I check email (mikefrohme@yahoo.com) , PM, and B/S/T thread in that order.

Broadleaf-class cards

  * Birmingham - SGC 40 - Cycle - HOLD
  * Lange - raw (likely AUTH) (Anon Factory 25) - 175
  * Hyatt - raw  (likely AUTH) (Broadleaf) - 125
  * Tyler - SGC A (Anonymous Factory 25) - 225

Napoleon Backs

  * Drake - PSA 4 - 250
  * [STRIKE]Turner - SGC A - 90[/STRIKE] SOLD

Recruits - raw

  * Cicotte VG - HOLD
  * Wagner VG - 75

Sides :D:D:D - images on request

 * T207 Recruit box (empty) rough - $10
 * E92 Stone (blue bkg) - PSA 6 - (Nadja) - $225 

Thanks for looking.

Hi Mike,

Thanks,

Patrick

Thanks Mike!
